transArray.content: It's great. The wireless network is very fast and the service is very good. It's a good choice for a business trip in Beijing. There is a free parking lot and the transportation is very convenient.

Thank you very much for your affirmation and love for Xiaoji. Giving you a quiet and comfortable stay experience has always been the direction of our efforts. Every step of our growth is inseparable from your support. We look forward to your visit again.
